eg.document

Class FileDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.document.FileDocument

  • public final class FileDocument
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the document that is either initialized with a language and which a file may be assigned to afterwards or is initialized with a file which defines the (then unchangeable) language

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileDocument(EditArea editArea, java.io.File f)
      Creates a FileDocument with the specified file whose content is displayed.
      FileDocument(EditArea editArea, Languages lang)
      Creates a FileDocument with the specified language

      • enableCodeEditing

        public void enableCodeEditing(boolean isEnabled)
        Enables or disables actions in responce to the editing of source code. This affects syntax coloring and auto-indentation. Has no effect if this language is not a coding language.
        Parameters:
        isEnabled - true to enable, false to disable

      • colorSection

        public void colorSection(java.lang.String section,
                         int pos)
        Colors a section of the document that starts at the specified position. Has no effect if this language is not a coding language
        Parameters:
        section - the section
        pos - the position
